Package svs

Class BallotFactory

java.lang.Object
svs.BallotFactory
public class BallotFactory
extends java.lang.Object
The class BallotFactory is responsible for taking input files as a File array from the MainWindow and return the arraylist of total number of ballots inside a given list of files. It must be connected to appropriate methods and actions involved in the MainWindow. This Class provides an appropriate data structure for which the ballots can be used by different algorithms such as Plurality and STV with Droop Quota for classes PluralityController and STVDroopController respectively.

    static Candidate[] InitCandidates​(java.io.File[] files)
    This method provides number of candidates by pruning first row of the file and saving candidates in an custom array.

      public static java.util.ArrayList<Ballot> InitBallots​(boolean shuffle, java.io.File[] files, Candidate[] candidates) throws java.io.IOException
      The method InitBallots provide appropriate data structure for storing total number of ballots from the files selected by the user.
      Parameters:
      shuffle - is a boolean argument provided by the user from MainWindow
      files - are list of selected files provided by the user from MainWindow
      candidates - are the list of candidates
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of candidates from
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if no files can be found.

    • InitCandidates

      public static Candidate[] InitCandidates​(java.io.File[] files) throws java.io.IOException
      This method provides number of candidates by pruning first row of the file and saving candidates in an custom array.
      Parameters:
      files - are list of selected files provided by the user from MainWindow
      Returns:
      number of candidates inside the selected files.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if no files can be found.
